name: Dreams Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: Stayed here for 3 nights in Nov 2010.Hotel is located in the centre of Dalat 5 mins walk from Market and Ba Dinh Square.The owner Mrs Dung is so friendly,helpful and laid back and is always available for sightseeing and restaurant reccomendations.Previous reviews are true,the breakfast is the best u wlll get anywhere.On the top floor of the hotel is a jacuzzi sauna and steam room, overlooking the busy street the hotel is in,.open from 5 pm until 8 pm and is great for an hour or so before heading out for dinner.I would definately recomend this hotel,and if i visit Dalay again this is where i,ll stay...
reviews.title: Best B and B in Dalat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Dreams Hotel in Dalat for 3 nights and found it absolutely brilliant, it feels like you are staying in a B & B. Mrs Dung, the owner is so helpful nothing is too much trouble. The Breakfast is the best breakfast you will ever get in Vietnam. I would definately recommend a trip to Dalat and make sure you stay at the Dreams Hotel.
reviews.title: A Great Hotel in Da Lat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: this hotel was a lovely place to stay for the price. the staff were Honest and didn't scam us for the first time on our entire trip! the rooms were clean and bathroom worked which was a big change from the other hotels we had stayed at. breakfast was lovely, lots of fresh fruit and VEGEMITE! close to everything, only a five minute walk to the markets. We will definitely stay here again. Best part was the staff spoke english and did not rip us off!
reviews.title: Comfortable and no Viet"SCAM"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I know there's already over 100 reviews of this hotel saying how amazing it is, but after staying there I felt I had to write my own review!
reviews.title: This hotel really feels like a home from home...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We turned up without booking to find that they didnt have any spare rooms - but the owner (an actual saint) recommended another hotel a few doors away and insisted that we came for breakfast anyway! We moved to Dreams hotel the next day, and ended up staying an extra night aswell because we loved it so much.
reviews.title: Absolutely Worth It!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Dreams Hotel might've been our favorite hotel in all of Vietnam. The value is incredible -- $20-30 goes a LONG way -- and the owner/manager was a delightful woman who knew everything in town. The breakfast was ample and delicious. The room was very nice and the wi-fi coverage was superb. Book this hotel! You won't be disappointed!
reviews.title: Outstanding value and great staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What can I say that hasnt already been said? Felt like home, best stay of 3 weeks in Vietnam. Had front room with window seat and balcony. Mrs Dung and family so relaxed and welcoming. Breakfast is awesome, my partner fell on the Vegemite like it was manna from heaven, Mrs Dung even made toast for us. The fruit, tomatoes and avocados were so fresh. Would return tomorrow.
reviews.title: The Best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: very welcoming, helpfu,l unintrusive, they dont try to sell you trips but are willing to give advice if you ask.
reviews.title: you get a lot for your money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was really clean and comfortable tv had good selection of channels,bed and pillows really comfy.
reviews.title: Fantastic hospitality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: The sauna and jacuzzi on the roof are a real added bonus considering what you would pay outside for these.
reviews.title: one of the best in Vietnam

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010
reviews.text: We were picked up from the hotel by a car sent by the hotel. The driver was very friendly and helpful. We checked in without a problem and the bathroom was fanastic!! Giang our front desk clerk was always there to help us with any questions and pointed us to a delicious noodle soup shop across the street a few stores down. It was sooo delicious and those places where there is no menu. The banh bao they sold there was also one of the best I've tasted. And trust me I've had a lot of steamed buns in my lifetime!!
reviews.title: Excellent breakfast and rooms!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Giang also helped update us on the situation at nha trang as the roads were closed and our plans needed changing. The breakfast was plentiful and the eggs, bread, fruit was more than I could ask for. Prob don't need lunch if u timed it well enough. Excellent value for money.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010
reviews.text: Only downside is that the room constantly felt damp, though we didn't smell any mould or see any.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel, loved it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place is good. It has spacious rooms and soundproof windows.
reviews.title: As good as everyone says!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: The breakfast is great and so is the location. Nothing to nag about here.
reviews.title: Just stay there

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was $25 for a double and worth every penny - rooms don't have air con but you don't need it in Dalat.
reviews.title: Amazing room, staff, breakfast and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: On the roof of the hotel there is a small spa with hot tub, sauna and steam room - which is lovely after a few days trekking! The owner of the hotel went out of her way to help us organise an easy rider tour - even though the don't take commission. Internet and computer use was free - wifi routers on every floor meant good connection.
reviews.title: Great value - Amazing breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The included breakfast spread was fruits, eggs, bread, juice and tea or coffee as well as lots more - even peanut butter!
reviews.title: great hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would recommend this hotel and have to everyone we've met on their way to Dalat!!
reviews.title: Fantastic service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed there with a dozen of friends.
reviews.title: An excellent place to stay

description: The Dreams Hotels are situated close to the city centre. A full breakfast and free internet are included in the price. All rooms have bathroom, cable TV, mini bar, AC heater and telephone.
